Hello, We're a low cost VPS provider with a focus on the storage market. We have put together an infrastructure using **VMWARE ESXi** as our virtualization platform and 12*6TB HDD's in RAID6 to provide upto 60TB of storage per host. We can interconnect as many nodes as needed to provide you with as much storage as you desire.

The offer we have for the LET market is a low cost backup style VPS for $7 a month.

The VPS's come with one **2Ghz vCPU** and **512MB RAM** along with a massive **250GB HDD** for your data. You can upgrade these at any time.

We can provide licences for windows or provide your own, if you would like a specific OS installed on your VPS then select custom at the order page and make sure to send us a ticket with a name/link to what you need.
